N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 343.6 - Joinder

State Regulations
(a) The department
shall have the power to combine into a single proceeding the assessment of
civil penalties and the suspension, revocation or limitation of an operating
certificate, upon proper notice in accord with the provisions of this

Part. (b) The department shall have
the right to join in one proceeding all those respondents if there is asserted
against them jointly, severally or in the alternative any violation arising out
of the same transaction or occurrence, and if there is any question of law or
fact common to all respondents which will arise in the proceeding. Notes
